mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, permission, permission_name, menu_type, sequence, path, hidden, component, redirect, icon
mapper.insert:
insert into menu
id,
parent_id,
name,
permission,
permission_name,
menu_type,
sequence,
path,
hidden,
component,
redirect,
icon,

mapper.update:
update menu
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hidden = #{hidden,jdbcType=BIT},
component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
redirect = #{redirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hidden = #{hidden,jdbcType=BIT}, component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, redirect = #{redirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.sequence, m.parent_id, m.path, m.hidden, m.component, m.redirect, m.icon, m.menu_type, m.permission, m.permission_name
mapper.select: FROM role_menu rm, menu m, role r, sys_user su, sys_role sr WHERE rm.menu_id = m.id AND rm.role_id = r.id AND sr.role_id = r.id AND sr.sys_user_id = su.id AND su.id = #{sysUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY m.id ASC, m.sequence ASC;
